data.comment: The big names in today's match at Deepdale have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Preston.
In the minute 14, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Tom Barkhuizen.
Josh Knight (Wycombe) gets a yellow card.
Josh Harrop is replacing Ben Pearson for Preston at Deepdale.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Deepdale.
James Linington has blown to start the second-half.
Garath McCleary is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 61, Preston make their second substitution with Emil Riis Jakobsen replacing Sean Maguire.
The away team replace Anthony Stewart with David Wheeler.
Paul Huntington for Preston has been booked by James Linington and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Alex Neil (Preston) is making a third substitution, with Jayden Stockley replacing Joe Rafferty.
The home team have replaced Daniel Johnson with Brad Potts. This is the fourth substitution made today by Alex Neil.
Goal! Wycombe have got their heads in front thanks to a Scott Kashket strike.
In the minute 79, Gareth Ainsworth is making the team's second substitution at Deepdale with Nick Freeman replacing Daryl Horgan.
Matt Bloomfield is replacing Fred Onyedinma for the away team.
Jack Grimmer is booked for the away team.
In the minute 84, Alex Samuel is on a sub for Adebayo Akinfenwa for Wycombe.
Wycombe's Scott Kashket has been booked in Preston.
Jason McCarthy scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 2-2 at Deepdale.
James Linington blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
